meanings.definition: The period of time following the regular season in sports, typically involving playoff games or tournaments.
meanings.sent1: During the postseason, teams compete to become the ultimate winner.
meanings.sent2: The postseason is when the top teams face off to see who will be the champion.
meanings.sent3: In the postseason, the teams battle it out for victory.
meanings.sent4: The intensity of the postseason is like a fierce battle for glory.
meanings.sent5: Fans eagerly await the postseason to see which team will emerge victorious.

meanings.definition: A series of games or events that take place after the regular season to determine a champion.
meanings.sent1: The postseason games decide the ultimate champion of the league.
meanings.sent2: After the regular season, the postseason determines the best team.
meanings.sent3: Players train hard to perform their best in the postseason.
meanings.sent4: The postseason is the final battleground for the top teams.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the postseason is unmatched as teams fight for the title.
